sentences.en: a lump of gristle
sentences.cn: 一块软骨

sentences.en: Do hurry up, you great lump!
sentences.cn: 快点儿, 你这个笨蛋!

sentences.en: He commuted his pension into a lump sum.
sentences.cn: 他把退休金一次领清,拿了一大笔钱.

sentences.en: I stood there with a lump in my throat and tried to fight back tears.
sentences.cn: 我站在那里，喉咙哽塞，拼命想止住眼泪。

sentences.en: I thanked him with a lump in my throat.
sentences.cn: 我哽咽着向他道谢.

sentences.en: I've got a lump on my shoulder.
sentences.cn: 我的肩膀上有个肿块。

sentences.en: If you don't like it, you may [ can ] lump it.
sentences.cn: 你不喜欢, 也得容忍一下.

sentences.en: It was a great reception and it brought a lump to my throat.
sentences.cn: 如此盛情接待，叫我一时哽咽。

sentences.en: Lenny still could not dissolve the nagging lump of tension in his chest.
sentences.cn: 莱尼仍不能消除令他不安的紧张感。

sentences.en: One day, I noticed a lump in her skin.
sentences.cn: 有一天，我注意到她皮肤上有个肿块。

sentences.en: She impaled a lump of meat on her fork.
sentences.cn: 她用叉子戳起一块肉。

sentences.en: Strain the custard to remove lumps.
sentences.cn: 滤去牛奶蛋糊里的面块。

sentences.en: The crew will be sleeping in the hull and will have to lump it.
sentences.cn: 船员将睡在船舱里，不乐意也没办法。

sentences.en: The media tends to lump all these groups together.
sentences.cn: 媒体倾向于把这几类人归在一起.

sentences.en: The potter shaped and squeezed the lump of clay into a graceful shape.
sentences.cn: 制陶工人把黏土块捏塑成优美的形状。

sentences.en: Then the lump or cancer attaches itself to this wall.
sentences.cn: 然后肿块或癌就附着在那钙壁上。

sentences.en: there was a lump in her throat as she gazed down at her uncle's gaunt features.
sentences.cn: 当她看到叔父憔悴的样子，她哽咽了。

sentences.en: They used to buy ten kilos of beef in one lump.
sentences.cn: 他们过去常买10公斤重的整块牛肉。

sentences.en: We will lump our money.
sentences.cn: 我们将把所有的钱合在一起.

sentences.en: You are the one with a lump.
sentences.cn: 你是那个有了肿块的人。

sentences.en: You pay regular premiums and in return the insurance company will pay out a lump sum.
sentences.cn: 你定期支付保险费，而保险公司则会一次性给你一笔钱作为回报。

words.tran_cn: 粗笨的；波浪起伏的；多块状物的
码头工人；装卸工；小承包商
块，块状；[医]肿块；瘤；很多；笨人
混在一起；使成块状；忍耐；笨重地移动

phrases.tran_cn: 哽咽：感情激动造成的喉咙哽住
整笔付款；一次总算，一次总付
混合价格；总括价格；整笔计价格
(非正式，主 北美)受惩罚；被攻击（或打败）

trans.tran_cn: 块，团，肿块，许多，大量，笨拙的人
trans.tran_en: a small piece of something solid, without a particular shape

trans.tran_cn: 混在一起；使成块状；忍耐；笨重地移动
trans.tran_en: to tolerate or put up with; endure (in the phrase lump it)

trans.tran_cn: 结成块，成团，笨重地行走
trans.tran_en: to collect into a mass or group

trans.tran_cn: 使成团，使成块，使团结在一起，把…混在一起
trans.tran_en: to put two or more different people or things together and consider them as a single group, sometimes wrongly
